mapper.sql: SPU_ID , CATEGORY_ID, BRAND_ID, SPU_NAME, SPU_TYPE, `STATUS`, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into tb_spu (SPU_ID, CATEGORY_ID, BRAND_ID, SPU_NAME, SPU_TYPE, `STATUS`, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into tb_spu
SPU_ID,
CATEGORY_ID,
BRAND_ID,
SPU_NAME,
SPU_TYPE,
`STATUS`,
OPTION01,
OPTION02,
OPTION03,
OPTION04,
OPTION05,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_TIME,
#{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{spuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update tb_spu
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SPU_NAME = #{spuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPU_TYPE = #{spuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where SPU_ID = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_spu set CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SPU_NAME = #{spuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPU_TYPE = #{spuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SPU_ID = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT T1.SPU_ID ,T1.CATEGORY_ID ,T1.BRAND_ID ,T1.SPU_NAME ,T1.SPU_TYPE ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_SPU T1

SELECT T1.SPU_ID ,T1.CATEGORY_ID ,T1.BRAND_ID ,T1.SPU_NAME ,T1.SPU_TYPE ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_SPU T1 WHERE T1.SPU_ID = #{spuId}
